Description:
Original clean version with two interface languages Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹and updates on July 28, 2014

We offer you the operating system Ã‚Â«Windows 7 Professional" Service Pack 1 (SP1), which (according to numerous requests and desires) manually with a maximum precision built only official upgrade from Microsoft and is given the choice of language between English and Russian.

Windows 7 Professional - the professional level version for small business; to use one PC at the office and at home, as well as for training. Among other features, this version provides a connection to the company network through a domain (Domain Join), data protection through backup over the network, and encrypted file system, as well as printing to the correct printer at home or office using the route (Location Aware Printing)
The main distinguishing features of Windows 7:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ DirectAccess - provides mobile users secure access to corporate networks from the Internet without the need to create a virtual private network (VPN).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ BitLocker and BitLocker To Go - helps protect data on PCs and removable drives, if necessary, to force encryption and creates backup copies of keys for data recovery.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ BranchCache - reduces the time users of the branches of the company spend on downloading files over the network.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enterprise Search Scopes - provides one simple interface for finding information on the corporate network, including sites SharePoint.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ AppLocker - allows the administrator through a centrally managed, but flexible group policies to determine which applications can and what can not be run on user PCs.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improvements in technology deployment for virtual environments Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) - Updated interface VDI includes support for multiple monitors and microphones. Also possible to use images of the virtual machine to boot physical PC.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Subsystem for UNIX-Based Applications (SUA) - Subsystem for Unix-application facilitates the integration between Windows and UNIX / Linux-environment.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multilingual User Interface (MUI) - the ability to create a single image for all language versions and all types of hardware (desktop, laptop, Tablet PC), which will provide a more convenient and rapid deployment of the operating system. A user can then, if necessary, to switch the operating system interface (in particular the menu dialogs, training and support files) on any of the supported languages.
